summaryOfNewsArticle: This article highlights a collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts broadcast by NPR on February 28, 2024, at 2:20 PM EST. The concerts, part of a long-running series showcasing live, intimate music performances, serve as a cultural bridge between artists and audiences by highlighting diverse musical talent and providing accessible, high-quality performances that foster community engagement and appreciation of music across genres and regions.
title: A Collection of Featured Tiny Desk Concerts
